body_html: @josh11b Our friend here maintains the Julia language wrapper for TensorFlow. It would make his job easier if the OpDef proto specified which inputs and attributes are indices. Does this sound like a reasonable request to you?
body_text: @josh11b Our friend here maintains the Julia language wrapper for TensorFlow. It would make his job easier if the OpDef proto specified which inputs and attributes are indices. Does this sound like a reasonable request to you?
body: @josh11b Our friend here maintains the [Julia language wrapper for TensorFlow](https://github.com/malmaud/TensorFlow.jl). It would make his job easier if the OpDef proto specified which inputs and attributes are indices. Does this sound like a reasonable request to you?
